# Data loading

```{r, echo = TRUE, include = TRUE}
iris_pca = read.csv("output/iris_pca.csv")
# ignore the first column (row indices)
iris_pca = iris_pca[, -1]
```

# Plot the principal components

```{r, echo = TRUE, include = TRUE}
# extract the variables
PC1 = iris_pca[, 1]
PC2 = iris_pca[, 2]
species = iris_pca[, 3]
# plot
plot(x=PC1, y=PC2, col=as.factor(species), main="iris")
legend("topleft", legend=unique(species), fill=as.factor(unique(species)))
```
